title: There's a Dragon Downstairs
description: There's adragon downstairsat Sophie's house.Every night Sophie hears him...rattling through the cat flap,slinking to the living room,growing and growingin the dark.Mom and Dad say there's no dragon, but Sophie is determined to find him herself!Award-winning author Hilary McKay and illustrator Amanda Harvey have created a wonderfully imaginative tale about confronting nighttime fears, a story that will delight young children everywhere.
author: Hilary McKay
